post.body: Crazy weather. 55 degrees at 10pm here in Portland Maine.
Hey, thanks. Not heard of ooVoo. Does that integrate with Skype or a separate Skype-like service?
mayhem
This is the most I've decorated in almost 10 years. Finally, I have my self back - and my Self loves Christmas.
Hey you. Get a poinsettia and a Christmas candle. You'll not have any hassle or mess AND you'll feel a little more in the spirit.
Hey, I need help recording a Skype call. Can I call you tomorrow morning and give it a go?
Hey, Glenn, congratulations! Not familiar with... but sounds like you're beyond glad! Good for you.
lol, yes. I mindfully ate some of my cute Xmas decorations - red & green M&Ms. ;) @klabrecque, we're into mindful living.
Give me about 6-weeks. ;)
oh! Good move. Didn't know that. The M&Ms I had pre-pretzels did me in. Oh well. As Scarlett says, "Tomorrow is another day."
Thankfully @mrpabloruiz (no . ) didn't see your tweet. He was busy chewing on the big red bow that was to hang on the door. *arf*
too bad you're not in Maine! @costavidafred and I would be in with you!
Love it! RT-Christmas when you live on a boat. http://is.gd/bTam
Not sure if my pretzels & scotch stack up to your pop corn & wine, but we're both in the *before* category of healthy eating.
Hmmm. ok, but first let me be sure it's you. What are the last 4 digits of your ss#? Your mother's maiden name? Your childhood pet?
Ah... no surprise.
This is the ... hey, you changed your name? Or is this an imposter greg with 1-g?
Yes and @mrPabloRuiz has taken cover under the bed and hasn't come out for 2 hours! Here Pablo, Good Boy!
& Simon make friends at the Axon open house. Come on by!! 377 Fore St. 4th floor - to 1:30 or until the champagne runs o...
Thanks for the RT cred on that video - It was actually by way of about 3 others! but guess it's now "viral"... ;)
Now I will disagree: You are very creative - just not in the drawing dept, perhaps. ;)
A job for Where? RT @cheeky_geeky: @dunkindonuts give me nearest location going from DC north to Syracuse ASAP thx.
Also, when shooting a glass of iced "whatever" glycerin dots on the outside of the glass = icy condensation.
You have to go to bed at 6:00 THIS Thurs. too? So sad to cut Christmas Day short - but then again...
Why thank you. Now my day is complete. #festivus AND #tall&salty are no longer mysteries. *sigh* On with work.
Save us un-cool-ones out here. What's a tall & salty? A starbucks something-or-other?
Try Wikipedia.
And now, thanks to @michaelGregoire I am in-the-know about Festivus. Happy Festivus to you. http://is.gd/ay9t
Now I'm complete. r-r-r. Festivus - a bitch session with a goal post.
<--- Crumudgeon Alert! (Hello from Maine Sweetie. Where ya been?)
1) Dumbest TV show I've seen in a long time "Worst Week" (or the High School Musical reality show on my other channel). Sad.
The Christmas spirit has arrived at my house. - Photo: http://bkite.com/030QH
CJ holding court at the Axon open house. Come on by if u r near 377 Fore St. 4th floor. Champagne just opened! - Photo: http://bkite....
Hey @barbatsea RT @ccmaine: @lynnelle #tall&saltys = known as a Salted Caramel Hot Chocolate at Starbucks
Finalizing the outline for revised website. Must get back to it boys & girls. Last important (documented) to-do before accountability âœ” in.
Last tweet was RT @ellieeille and @MarketingProfs and @prblog - Not sure where it originated!
Charlie Brown Ad Agency: The part where Linus points out the true meaning of advertising always brings a tear... http://tinyurl.com/5k4tl8
RT @JessicaKnows for @sandiamorello... Want to be part of Project Mom it Forward? All the deets http://twurl.nl/crwscu
Last BOLD Bulletin of the year out at 6:50am this morning. Already have several *thank you* emails back. Very, very nice. I love my job!
Great! Two ways to wirelessly sync Google Calendar with your iPhone: http://twurl.nl/136mqo Thanks, @mainebusiness RT
